Title: Junior Scientist
Description: Junior Scientist is typically a platform for school students with a passion for science and innovation to showcase projects or models relatable to science & technology.

Title: Project Exhibition
Description: It is an event where students or participants showcase their research, experiments or innovative ideas through projects and models. This exhibition will provide an opportunity for individuals to demonstrate their knowledge, creativity, and skills while receiving feedback from peers, educators, and judges, often encouraging collaboration and learning in various fields.
